# List Item Icon

`bal-list-item-subtitle` is a child component of `bal-list` that defines the subtitle list row element.

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->

| -------- | --------- | ----------- | --------- | ------- |
| `dense`  | `dense`   |             | `boolean` | `false` |
